solution_line_template: The total number of tabs in three windows of each browser is {tabs_per_window}*{windows_per_browser} = <<{tabs_per_window}*{windows_per_browser}={tabs_per_browser}>>{tabs_per_browser} tabs.

If James had two browsers on his computer and in each browser he opened three windows, the total number of tabs in the two browsers is {num_browsers}*{tabs_per_browser} = <<{num_browsers}*{tabs_per_browser}={total_tabs}>>{total_tabs} tabs.
